alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Orange; Western Addison; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 2:21PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Orange, southern Addison, north central Rutland and northwestern Windsor Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 221 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Middlebury, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Middlebury, Cornwall, Sudbury, Weybridge, Hancock, Salisbury, Ripton, Brandon, Leicester, Whiting, New Haven, Goshen, Rochester, Granville, Hubbardton, Braintree, Bristol, Lincoln, Bridport, and East Middlebury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Orange; Western Addison; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
